attributes.action: Help to save rural public houses by allowing smoking rooms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public huses in rural areas are closing as a result of this government's draconian smoking laws. Pubs in rual areas have a different dynamic to those in more 'metropolitan' regions. Ventilated smoking rooms should be an option at the discretion of the landlord. Let us make our own decisions.
